title: Family Feud Africa, Brooklyn Center, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
itunes:title: Family Feud Africa, Brooklyn Center, Sheryl Underwood, Carla's Reality Update and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Steve Harvey is back! Steve has so much to say about the death of Daunte Wright. Bobby Brown stopped by Red Table Talk to speak with Jada Pinkett Smith. Big Dog will begin filming Season 2 of Family Feud South Africa. The auntie of Daunte Wright speaks out. Our girl from The Talk is here asking Junior questions. She is focused! Inside Reality Update, @lipsbycarla is coming in hot! She hands it over to Fool #1 to talk about tomorrow's upcoming episode of Ready to Love. Convicted fraudster Bernie Madoff died yesterday at age 82. Today Big Dog wraps up the show with a recommendation for your bucket list.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
